closeOnSelect.description: Whether the select should close after an option is selected

form.description: The associate form of the underlying select.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the accordion. Useful for composition.

loop.description: Whether to loop the keyboard navigation through the options

name.description: The `name` attribute of the underlying select.

onChange.description: The callback fired when the selected option changes.

onClose.description: The callback fired when the menu is closed.

onHighlight.description: The callback fired when the highlighted option changes.

onInteractOutside.description:
Callback fired when an outside interaction was triggered.
Useful for preventing blur on select when composing it with other components.

onOpen.description: The callback fired when the menu is opened.

positioning.description: The positioning options of the menu.

selectOnTab.description:
Whether to select the highlighted option when the user presses Tab,
and the menu is open.
